name: Soul Devourer
description:
You are a ghost that wants only one thing, to devour many souls. You are offered a choice among many spells and their improvements. Choose wisely to defeat your enemies!

You can play both from your phone (android) and from your computer.

The game uses local storage.

FX made in pixel fx designer. 

All graphics are drawn by me, I know it's not good because I'm not good at drawing, but I'm not a designer. Worth a try to find a good designer, but first I want to hear your opinion on this game.

English is not my native language :)
